class.name: panda_torque_mpc/CtrlModelPinocchioVsFranka
class.description: A controller that only compares Rigib Body Dynamics Algorithm values computed from Franka and pinocchio.

class.name: panda_torque_mpc/CtrlLogUpdateDt
class.description: Saves time and duration of update function to a file.

class.name: panda_torque_mpc/CtrlPlaybackPDplus
class.description: Playback joint trajectory recorded in csv files using.

class.name: panda_torque_mpc/CtrlJointSpaceID
class.description: Tracks a self generated joint trajectory using PD+ control.

class.name: panda_torque_mpc/CtrlTaskSpaceID
class.description: A controller that tracks an end effector trajectory (self generated or from ROS topic) using task space inverse dynamics.

class.name: panda_torque_mpc/CtrlMpcCroco
class.description: A controller that tracks and end effector trajectory using closed loop MPC implemented with Crocoddyl.
